name: facilitate
trans:
vt. 使便利, 减轻…的困难

时 态:  
facilitated, facilitating, facilitates 

名 词:  
facilitator

sentences.english: The new trade agreement should facilitate more rapid economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 新贸易协定应当会加快经济发展。

sentences.english: Structured teaching facilitates learning.
sentences.chinese: 有条理的教导有利于学习。

detailed_translations.english: to make an action or a process possible or easier

name: extract
trans:
- vt. 摘录；提取；榨取；取出
- n. 摘录；榨出物；汁；选粹


时 态:  
extracted, extracting, extracts 

名 词:  
extractor

sentences.english: You’ll have to have that tooth extracted.
sentences.chinese: 你得把那颗牙拔掉。

sentences.english: Oils are extracted from the plants.
sentences.chinese: 从这些植物中提炼出油。

sentences.english: I’ve only seen short extracts from the film.
sentences.chinese: 我只是看过那部电影的一些小片段。

detailed_translations.english: to remove an object from somewhere, especially with difficulty
a short piece of writing, music etc taken from a particular book, piece of music etc

name: diversity
trans:
- n. 多样化;(人在种族、民族、宗教等方面的)多样性
- 分歧

sentences.english: ...the cultural diversity of Latin America.
sentences.chinese: …拉丁美洲文化的多样性。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of including many different types of people or things

name: chronic
trans:
adj. 慢性的；长期的；习惯性的


副 词:  
chronically

名 词:  
chronicity

sentences.english: chronic arthritis
sentences.chinese: 慢性关节炎

sentences.english: chronic asthma
sentences.chinese: 慢性哮喘

sentences.english: chronic heart disease
sentences.chinese: 慢性心脏病

detailed_translations.english: a chronic disease or illness is one that continues for a long time and cannot be cured

name: collaborative
trans: adj. 合作的,协作的,协力完成的

sentences.english: ...a collaborative research project.
sentences.chinese: …一个合作研究项目。

detailed_translations.english: a job or piece of work that involves two or more people working together to achieve something

name: downturn
trans: n. (价格或活动)开始下降

sentences.english: America’s current economic downturn
sentences.chinese: 美国目前经济的衰退

detailed_translations.chinese: 衰退（经济方面）；低迷时期
detailed_translations.english: a period or process in which business activity, production etc is reduced and conditions become worse

name: organisation
trans: n. 〈主英〉组织,机构,团体

sentences.english: Please describe the goals your organisation is hoping to achieve through this partnership as well as any recognition you hope to receive for your partnership with the UN.
sentences.chinese: 请描述您的组织希望通过这个合作关系实现的目标，以及您希望从与联合国的合作关系得到的任何认可。

name: overlap
trans:
- n. 重叠；重复
- vi. 部分重叠；部分的同时发生
- vt. 与…重叠；与…同时发生


时 态:  
overlapped, overlapping, overlaps

sentences.english: When the bag is folded, the bottom overlaps one side.
sentences.chinese: 把包折叠起来时，其底部与一边就重合了。

sentences.english: Overlap the slices carefully so there are no gaps.
sentences.chinese: 把薄片小心地叠放在一起，那样就没有间隙。

detailed_translations.chinese: 部分重叠； 部分相同
detailed_translations.english: If one thing overlaps another, or if you overlap them, a part of the first thing occupies the same area as a part of the other thing. You can also say that two things overlap.
the amount by which two activities, ideas, things etc overlap

name: trigger
trans:
- vt. 触发；引发，引起
- vi. 松开扳柄
- n. 触发器；扳机；制滑机


时 态:  
triggered, triggering, triggers

sentences.english: He took aim and squeezed the trigger.
sentences.chinese: 他瞄准目标，扣动了扳机。

sentences.english: The assassination triggered off a wave of rioting.
sentences.chinese: 这次暗杀事件引发了一阵骚乱。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a gun that you pull with your finger to fire it
to make something happen very quickly, especially a series of events

name: Revelation
trans:
- n. 显露, 泄露, 透露, 揭露
- 被揭露的事, 暴露出来的事

name: degradation
trans:
- n. 下降，降低；降级
- 堕落；丢脸
- 陵削，剥蚀
- 革除神职

sentences.english: ...air pollution, traffic congestion, and the steady degradation of our quality of life.
sentences.chinese: …空气污染、交通阻塞以及我们生活质量的持续恶化。

detailed_translations.english: the process by which something changes to a worse condition

name: delicacy
trans:
- n. 精致，精美；娇嫩
- 精美的食物
- 棘手；微妙
- 对…感到棘手

sentences.english: Snails are considered a delicacy in France.
sentences.chinese: 在法国，蜗牛被认为是一种珍贵的美食。

detailed_translations.chinese: 美味；佳肴；微妙；精密；精美；敏锐，敏感；世故，圆滑
detailed_translations.english: something good to eat that is expensive or rare

name: equitable
trans:
- adj. 公正的,合理的
- n. 公正,合理
- adv. 公正地,合理地

名 词:  
equitableness

副 词:  
equitably

sentences.english: an equitable distribution of food supplies
sentences.chinese: 所供应食品的合理分配

detailed_translations.chinese: 公平的，公正的；平衡法的
detailed_translations.english: treating all people in a fair and equal way

name: potent
trans: adj. 有效的；强有力的，有权势的；有说服力的

sentences.english: potent drugs
sentences.chinese: 强效药物

sentences.english: a potent symbol of oppression
sentences.chinese: 压迫的有力象征

sentences.chinese: 广告的力量很大，把吸烟说成为社会所接受的习惯。

sentences.english: A good company pension scheme remains a potent weapon for attracting staff.
sentences.chinese: 良好的公司养老金计划依然是吸引员工的有效武器。

name: converge
trans:
- vi. (线条、运动的物体等)会于一点, 向一点会合
- (趋于)相似或相同

时 态:  
converged, converging, converges

sentences.english: The two rivers converge into one near Pittsburgh.
sentences.chinese: 这两条河在匹兹堡附近汇合。

detailed_translations.chinese: 会合， 互相靠拢； 聚集， 集中； 趋近
detailed_translations.english: to come from different directions and meet at the same point to become one thing

name: microbe
trans:
n. 细菌，微生物


形容词:  
microbial

sentences.english: ...a type of bacteria that include the microbes responsible for tuberculosis and leprosy.
sentences.chinese: …包括引起结核病和麻风病的微生物在内的一类细菌。

detailed_translations.english: an extremely small living thing which you can only see if you use a  microscope  . Some microbes can cause diseases.

name: radical
trans:
- adj. 根本的，基本的；彻底的，完全的
- 激进的，激进派的

副 词:  
radically

名 词:  
radicalness

sentences.english: They are proposing radical changes to the way the company is run.
sentences.chinese: 他们建议对公司经营模式进行重大改革。

sentences.english: a radical reform of the tax system
sentences.chinese: 税收制度的彻底改革

sentences.english: There are radical differences between the two organizations.
sentences.chinese: 这两个组织有着根本差异。

detailed_translations.chinese: 根本的，基本的；激进的，激进派的

name: accessible
trans:
- adj. 容易取得的，容易获得的，容易达到的
- 可接近的，可进入的；易接近的，易进入的
- (指人)易见到的，易相处的，平易近人的，可与之打交道的
- 可理解的，易懂的
- 易受影响的，易感染的，易受引诱的
- 可达的，可通的，通达的

副 词:  
accessibly

sentences.english: The island is only accessible by boat.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛只有坐船才能到。

sentences.english: There is a church which is easily accessible from my home.
sentences.chinese: 有座教堂离我家很近。

detailed_translations.chinese: 易接近的；可进入的；可理解的
detailed_translations.english: a place, building, or object that is accessible is easy to reach or get into

name: undermine
trans:
- vt. 在某物下挖洞或挖通道；侵蚀…的基础
- 暗中破坏；逐渐削弱

时 态:  
undermined，undermining，undermines

sentences.english: economic policies that threaten to undermine the health care system
sentences.chinese: 可能会损害医疗保健制度的经济政策

detailed_translations.english: to gradually make someone or something less strong or effective

name: replacement
trans:
- n. 代替, 替换, 更换
- 替换的人[物]

sentences.chinese: 我们的旧车急需更换。

sentences.english: replacement windows
sentences.chinese: 新换的窗户

detailed_translations.english: when you get something that is newer or better than the one you had before

name: boon
trans:
- n. 恩惠；利益；福利
- adj. 愉快的；慷慨的

sentences.chinese: 正是这个原因电视机成为这么多人的一大福音。

name: staple
trans:
- n. 主要产品；钉书钉；主题；主食
- vt. 用钉书钉钉住；把……分级
- adj.主要的，大宗生产的；常用的；纺织纤维的

时 态:  
stapled, stapling, staples

detailed_translations.chinese: 订书钉，U形钉；主食；主要产品

to fasten two or more things together with a staple

name: rigorous
trans:
- adj. 严密的；缜密的
- 严格的，严厉的

副 词:  
rigorously

名 词:  
rigorousness

sentences.english: a rigorous analysis of defence needs
sentences.chinese: 对国防需求的缜密分析

sentences.english: the rigorous standards required by the college
sentences.chinese: 大学规定的严格标准

name: herald
trans:
- n. 使者, 预报者
- vi. 预示

时 态:  
heralded, heralding, heralds

sentences.chinese: 一道闪电预示着暴雨即将来临。

sentences.chinese: 闪烁的蓝色灯光预示警察就要到达。

name: trivialise
trans: vt. 使显得琐碎〔不重要、不难等〕;轻视

polyester

名 词:  
polyesterification

sentences.english: a blue polyester shirt
sentences.chinese: 蓝色涤纶衬衫

detailed_translations.english: an artificial material used to make cloth

name: earner
trans: 挣钱人

sentences.chinese: 该国利润最高的出口商品

detailed_translations.english: a business or activity which makes a profit

name: kerb

- n. （植物的）茎，秆；（支持叶子、果实和花的）梗，柄；追踪；高视阔步

stalked, stalking, stalks

name: sustainability
trans: n. 持续性；永续性；能维持性

sentences.chinese: 这对于我的婚姻、持续性的成功和我可持续性的生活来说都是不公平的。

archipelagic

trans: adv. 虽然如此,但是

leapfrogged, leapfrogging, leapfrogs

name: contributory
trans:
- adj. 促成的;促进的;起作用的
- 需要受益人付钱的

sentences.chinese: 抽烟是导致肺癌的一个因素。

name: consistent
trans:
- adj. 一贯的, 始终如一的
- 一致的, 符合的

副 词:  
consistently

sentences.english: We need to be consistent in our approach.
sentences.chinese: 我们在方法上要前后一致。

detailed_translations.english: always behaving in the same way or having the same attitudes, standards etc – usually used to show approval

trans: adj. 进化的

sentences.chinese: 鸟类的进化过程

sentences.chinese: 有些科学家拒绝接受进化论。

sentences.chinese: 他支持渐进的社会变革。

- n. 诱惑物；诱惑；饵

lured, luring, lures

sentences.english: He lured her to his home and shot her with his father's gun.
sentences.chinese: 他把她诱骗到家里，然后用父亲的枪把她打死。

name: exploitative

detailed_translations.english: taking as much as possible from someone or something and giving very little in return

name: logical
trans:
adj. 逻辑学的；合逻辑的，合理的


名 词:  
logicality

副 词:  
logically

sentences.english: It’s a logical site for a new supermarket, with the housing development nearby.
sentences.chinese: 附近有住宅区，新的超级市场选址在此是合情合理的。

sentences.english: a logical conclusion
sentences.chinese: 合理的结论

detailed_translations.chinese: 逻辑的， 合乎常理的
detailed_translations.english: seeming reasonable and sensible

name: unsympathetic
trans:
- adj. 不同情的,冷漠无情的
- adv. 不同情地,冷漠无情地

name: smirk
trans:
- n. 傻笑；得意的笑
- vi. 傻笑

时 态:  
smirked，smirking，smirks 

名 词:  
smirker

形容词:  
smirky

sentences.english: The boys tried not to smirk.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们强忍住得意的笑。

detailed_translations.english: to smile in an unpleasant way that shows that you are pleased by someone else’s bad luck or think you are better than other people

name: heritage
trans:
- n. 遗产, 继承物
- 传统

sentences.english: the importance of preserving the national heritage
sentences.chinese: 保护民族遗产的重要性

sentences.english: beautiful old buildings which are part of our heritage
sentences.chinese: 属于我们遗产一部分的漂亮古建筑

detailed_translations.chinese: 遗产；传统；继承物；继承权
detailed_translations.english: the traditional beliefs, values, customs etc of a family, country, or society

name: originate
trans:
- vi. 起源于，来自，产生
- vt. 创造，创始，开创；发明

时 态:  
originated，originating，originates 

名 词:  
origination

形容词:  
originative

名 词:  
originator

sentences.english: The disease originated in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病起源于非洲。

sentences.english: All carbohydrates originate from plants.
sentences.chinese: 所有的碳水化合物均来源于植物。

detailed_translations.english: When something originates or when someone originates it, it begins to happen or exist

detailed_translations.chinese: 创造， 创始， 开创
detailed_translations.english: to have the idea for something and start it

name: boost
trans:
- vt. 促进；增加；支援
- vi. 宣扬；偷窃
- n. 帮助；推动；宣扬


时 态:  
boosted, boosting, boosts

sentences.english: The new resort area has boosted tourism.
sentences.chinese: 新的度假区促进了旅游业的发展。

detailed_translations.chinese: 推动， 促进， 激励； 替…做广告， 宣扬； 提高， 使增长
detailed_translations.english: to increase or improve something and make it more successful
something that gives someone more confidence, or that helps something increase, improve, or become successful

name: comparable
trans:
- adj. 类似的, 同类的, 相当的
- 可比较的, 比得上的

副 词:  
comparably

sentences.english: A car of comparable size would cost far more abroad.

detailed_translations.english: similar to something else in size, number, quality etc, so that you can make a comparison

name: supplant
trans:
vt. 代替；排挤掉


时 态:  
supplanted, supplanting, supplants

sentences.chinese: 巴克在党内的领导地位很快就被人取代了。

name: demonstration

sentences.english: Police opened fire on a peaceful demonstration.

detailed_translations.english: an event at which a large group of people meet to protest or to support something in public

- (波涛等)汹涌, 奔腾

surged, surging, surges

sentences.english: a device that protects your computer against electrical surges

name: waxy
trans:

trans: n. 上涌;上升流(指海水由较深层上升到较浅层的过程)

trans: n. 合适, 适合

name: emulate
trans:
vt. 与…竞争, 努力赶上

时 态:  
emulated, emulating, emulates 

形容词:  
emulative

副 词:  
emulatively

名 词:  
emulator

sentences.english: He hoped to emulate the success of Wilder.
sentences.chinese: 他希望效仿怀尔德的成功。

name: prolific
trans:
adj. 多产的；丰富的


名 词:  
prolificacy

副 词:  
prolifically

sentences.english: Handel’s prolific output of opera
sentences.chinese: 韩德尔丰富的歌剧作品

detailed_translations.english: a prolific artist, writer etc produces many works of art, books etc

name: decomposition
trans:
- n. 分解
- 腐烂

sentences.english: So no one decomposition is sufficient.
sentences.chinese: 因此一种分解是不够的。

sentences.english: This is an important difference, because it means that the additional transaction decomposition can be turned on only when required.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个很重要的不同点，因为这意味着仅仅在需要时才进行附加的事务分解。

sentences.chinese: 由于有了此算法，与其他的分解解决方案不同，没有只允许将兄弟或孩子元素/属性映射到同一个表的约束。

name: traverse
trans:

traversed, traversing, traverses

traverser

name: emboss

embossed, embossing, embosses

name: Advent
trans: n. 出现, 到来

- 选定, 任命

name: skeleton

trans:
- n. 供者；捐赠者；赠送人

sentences.chinese: 我们急需捐赠国的更多援助。

sentences.chinese: 一位匿名捐赠者向重建基金捐了500英镑。

name: notion
trans: n. 概念；见解；打算

detailed_translations.english: an idea, belief, or opinion

name: assessment

- 核定的付款额

name: scandal
trans:
- n. 丑事，丑闻
- 流言蜚语；闲话；诽谤
- 公愤；反感

sentences.english: It caused quite a scandal when he left his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他离开妻子成了一大丑闻。

sentences.english: The college has recently been involved in a drugs scandal .
sentences.chinese: 这所大学最近卷入了毒品丑闻。

sentences.english: He has been at the centre of a political scandal .
sentences.chinese: 他成了一桩政治丑闻的焦点。

sentences.chinese: 涉及政府的一桩重大丑闻

sentences.chinese: 一连串金融丑闻

sentences.chinese: 让他名誉扫地的性丑闻

sentences.chinese: 丑闻爆出时他们已经离开了这个国家。

name: notable
trans:
- adj. 值得注意的，显著的；著名的

notably

sentences.chinese: 如果有任何显著的不相符或让人起疑的情况，要想好该如何去解释这个情况。

name: burgeon

burgeoned, burgeoning, burgeons

someone who has been allowed to join a particular organization, club, or group and has been taught its secrets

salvaged, salvaging, salvages

sentences.chinese: 他们过去放羊的田野

name: rectify

rectified, rectifying, rectifies

rectifiable

rectification

detrimentally

detailed_translations.english: Adolescent is used to describe young people who are no longer children but who have not yet become adults. It also refers to their behaviour.

name: irresistible

sentences.chinese: 如果我对你的理解正确的话，你在主张不做任何事情去防止可能的工业文明的崩溃。

name: foster
trans:
- vt. 养育，抚育；培养；抱（希望等）

Foster福斯特(姓氏, 男子名)

时 态:  
fostered, fostering, fosters

sentences.english: The bishop helped foster the sense of a community embracing all classes.
sentences.chinese: 主教鼓励一种包容各个阶层的社区精神。

sentences.chinese: 那对夫妇想收养他们代养的一个黑人小孩。

name: sensible
trans:
- adj. 明智的；意识到的；通晓事理的；明显的

副 词:  
sensibly

sentences.english: She seems very sensible.
sentences.chinese: 她好像很明智。

sentences.chinese: 合理的建议

sentences.chinese: 把你的护照号码记下来是明智的。

sentences.chinese: 搬家似乎是明智的做法。

name: grimace
trans:

grimaced, grimacing, grimaces

sentences.english: She started to sit up, grimaced, and sank back weakly against the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 她开始坐起来，痛苦地皱着脸，又虚弱地靠回到枕头上。

detailed_translations.english: If you grimace, you twist your face in an ugly way because you are annoyed, disgusted, or in pain
an expression you make by twisting your face because you do not like something or because you are feeling pain

civilizable

name: execution

- n. 依法处决
- 实行, 执行
- 演奏, 技巧

sentences.chinese: 两名男子面临处决。

binges 

名 词:  
binger

sentences.chinese: 她偶尔狂饮一番。

sentences.chinese: 那个修道院在一个偏远的山口中。
